#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
struct ranking{
	ll score;
	int index;
};
ranking array[10001];
bool comp(ranking a,ranking b){
	if(a.score == b.score)
		return a.index<b.index;
	return a.score>b.score;																								
}
int main(){
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
		ll a,b;
		cin>>a>>b;
		array[i].score = a*b;
		array[i].index = i+1;
	}
	sort(array,array+n,comp);
	int q;
	cin>>q;
	while(q--){
		int a;
		cin>>a;
		cout<<array[a-1].index<<endl;
	}
}
